name: Escape The Soup
description:
Follow a young tomato on their Journey To escape a life on the plates of food critics. 

This is my first game to feature 3D models made exclusively by yours truly. Still working on the project file size. I hope you all enjoy my game!

Music by: https://opengameart.org/content/caketown-cuteplayful

Controlls:

WASD - Move

E - Talk to other tomatoes

Space - Jump, double jump, hover (Hold space then release to jump higher)

ESC - Quit
